title: T202 Just Before the Battle - to trade

posts.post_title: T202 Just Before the Battle - to trade
posts.post_content:
Hi

I would like to trade my T202 Just Before the Battle for another T202 on my wantlist shown below.  I am also open to trading for cards from other sets.  Especially, E121, E220.   Willing to trade for lesser condition card(s).

Thanks

Bob
